existing_features.title: Update the dropdown option text for the Bharatnatyam style so it clearly indicates the frequency "2 classes per week (8 per month)" wherever dance styles are shown using the shared style options list (e.g., the class catalog style filter and the class creation form style selector).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the "Select classes" dropdown menu to include a Bharatnatyam option with 2 classes per week (8 per month).

projectName: Update dropdown text to show Bharatnatyam class frequency (2/week, 8/month)
